Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: With GenAI I can ask as many questions as I want or need to better understand the content without looking slow, and I can further break it down if I'm really struggling to understand course material. I feel like using GenAI in conjunction with my teachers has helped develop a better understanding in some cases

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Personally, I prefer feedback from GenAI as because it is a machine, I feel less embarrassed when I need to repeat a question multiple times for me to properly understand the content

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: A teacher can only explain something so many times, GenAI can explain it a multitude of ways
